content: **drops bolero crochet in snow** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** one size length arm to arm approx 85 cm / 33½ **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 300 g color no 01 off-white and use drops vienna from garnstudio 50 g color no 21 off-white **drops vienna is no longer available you can replace by drops melody ** and use drops glitter from garnstudio 1 spool color no 01 gold drops crochet hook size 7 mm / l/11 crochet gauge 1 diamond should measure 27 x 27 cm / 10 5/8 x 10 5/8
